property.name: soft_nofile
property.description: Soft limit for the number of file handles or open files for user gpadmin. Value is set in file /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf

property.name: hard_nofile
property.description: Hard limit for the number of file handles or open files for user gpadmin. Value is set in /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf

property.name: soft_nproc
property.description: Soft limit for the maximum number of processes for user gpadmin. Value is set in /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf

property.name: hard_nproc
property.description: Hard limit for the maximum number of processes for user gpadmin. Value is set in /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf
